title: Gold/Plat team looking for a Top and Jungler
body:
We're a team of gold/plats looking for a solid top laner and jungler looking to have some fun and play ranked teams together so we can climb the ladder, would prefer gold/plats to fill the roles but if you're determined enough to stay with the team even after a few loses you're welcome.

Just a quick edit only the top lane role is open now

replies.body:
IGN Wolves 
would be interested in either
Keen to top, im g1 in plat promos :))

I can top

I'm gold 2 can play all top laners. :)
